amendment.description: To make available, with an offset, $10,000,000 for the pilot projects on early diagnosis and treatment of Post Traumatic Stress Disorder and other mental health conditions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2465 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2465 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12510) To make available, with an offset, $10,000,000 for the pilot projects on early diagnosis and treatment of Post Traumatic Stress Disorder and other mental health conditions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2465 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2465 proposed by Senator Warner.
